title: NARS Illuminator, Orgasm
description: /* STANDARD ACS WRAP */ .acs-ux-wrap {position: relative;text-align: center;zoom: 1;} .acs-ux-wrapfix { text-align: left;margin: 0 auto;padding: 0;width: 970px;font-family: arial, sans-serif !important;font-size: 13px !important;color: #333333;} .acs-ux-wrapfix a {color: #247bbd !important;text-decoration: none;} .acs-ux-wrapfix p {font-size: 13px;line-height: 19px;margin-top: 0 !important;padding: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-wrapfix p a {text-decoration: underline !important;} .acs-ux-wrapfix a:hover {color: #e47911 !important;text-decoration: underline;} .acs-ux-wrapfix strong {font-weight: bold;} .a-bottom-border {} .a-uppercase {text-transform: uppercase;} .acs-ux-wrapfix hr {background-color: transparent;display: block;height: 1px;border-width: 0;border-top: 1px solid #dddddd !important;line-height: 19px;margin-top: 0;margin-bottom: 14px;} /* IMPORTED FROM AUI */ .a-spacing-none {margin-bottom: 0px !important;} .a-spacing-micro {margin-bottom: 4px !important;} .a-spacing-mini {margin-bottom: 6px !important;} .a-spacing-small {margin-bottom: 10px !important;} .a-spacing-base {margin-bottom: 14px !important;} .a-spacing-medium {margin-bottom: 18px !important;} .a-spacing-large {margin-bottom: 22px !important;} .a-spacing-extra-large{margin-bottom: 26px !important;} .a-spacing-double-large{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}  .a-size-mini {font-size: 11px;line-height: 1.465;} .a-size-base {font-size: 13px;line-height: 19px;} .a-size-extra-large {font-size: 28px;line-height: 1.2;text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;} .a-size-large {font-size: 21px;line-height: 1.3;text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;} .a-size-medium {font-size: 17px;line-height: 1.255;text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;} .a-color-secondary {color: #888888 !important;} .a-italic {font-style: italic !important;} .a-text-normal {font-weight: normal !important;font-style: normal !important;text-transform: none !important;text-decoration: none !important;} .a-box {display: block;-webkit-border-radius: 4px;-moz-border-radius: 4px;border-radius: 4px;border: 1px #dddddd solid;background-color: white;} .a-color-alternate-background {background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;} .a-box .a-box-inner {padding: 14px 18px;-webkit-border-radius: 4px;-moz-border-radius: 4px;border-radius: 4px;position: relative;} /* A+ Template - Module 1 Specific CSS */ .acs-ux-aplus-module1 img {border: none;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1-leftwrap {width: 679px;display:block;float: left;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1-about {width: 230px;padding-left: 30px;margin-left: 30px;border-left: 1px solid #dddddd;float: right;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1-mainimg {float: left;width: 300px;display: block;margin-right: 20px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1-content {float: left;width: 359px;display: block;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1-attrbox {width: 200px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul:last-child, ol:last-child {margin-bottom: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul, ol {padding: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul {margin: 0 0 18px 18px !important;color: #aaaaaa;list-style-image: url('https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/img13/vxd/testing/prestigeaplus/checkmark.png')} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul li, ol li {word-wrap: break-word;margin: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul li {list-style-image: url('https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/img13/vxd/testing/prestigeaplus/checkmark.png'); margin: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module1 ul .a-list-item, ol .a-list-item {color: #333333;} /* A+ Template - Module 4 Specific CSS */ .acs-ux-aplus-wrapmodule4 {position: relative; text-align: center; zoom: 1;} .acs-ux-aplus-module4 {text-align: left;margin: 0 auto;width: 770px;padding: 0;background-color: #ffffff;height: 300px;position: relative;} .acs-ux-aplus-module4-right {padding-top: 80px;margin-left: 340px;width: 430px;height: 180px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module4-left {padding-top: 80px;width: 430px;height: 180px;} /* MODULE 4 ROW IMAGES */ #acs-ux-module4-row1 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_www1.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;} #acs-ux-module4-row2 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_www2.jpg') no-repeat right bottom;} #acs-ux-module4-row3 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_www3.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;} /* A+ Template - Module 3 Specific CSS */ .acs-ux-aplus-wrapmodule3 {position: relative; text-align: center; zoom: 1;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3 {text-align: left;margin: 0 auto;width: 770px;padding: 0;background-color: #ffffff;height: 300px;position: relative;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-slides {background-color: #ffffff;width: 770px;height: 300px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-slides-inner {margin-left: 345px;padding-top: 30px;} .acs-ux-module3-slidecontrol {position: absolute;top: 180px;left: 345px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall {width: 80px;height: 80px;cursor: pointer;float: left;margin-right: 35px;padding: 0;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall-bg {background-color: #ffffff;width: 80px;height: 80px;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall-last {margin-right: 0 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall a {text-transform: uppercase;font-size: 11px;font-weight: bold;color: 333333 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall a:hover {text-decoration: none;color: #333333 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall img {border: 1px solid #888888;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-opactiymodon a {color: 888888 !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-opactiymodon:hover {opacity: 1 !important;filter: alpha(opacity=100) !important;} .acs-ux-aplus-module3-opactiymodon img {opacity: 0.3;filter: alpha(opacity=30);} /* BACKGROUND IMAGES FOR SLIDES */ #acs-ux-module3-slide1 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_main2.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;} #acs-ux-module3-slide2 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_main3.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;} #acs-ux-module3-slide3 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/B0031NLHXC_main4.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;} #acs-ux-module3-slide4 {background: #ffffff url('http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/aplus/detail-page/nars_brand_logo_black_8-23-2013.jpg') no-repeat left bottom;}[if IE]> <style> .acs-ux-aplus-module3-tipimagesmall {margin-right: 20px !important;} </style> <![endif]

title: Sephora TOO FACED 'Eye Love' Shadow Palette + Shadow Insurance
